description:
His past life and current life are intersecting--a boy with memories of two lives faces his destiny! After his mother was killed at an early age, the orphaned Rio fought his hardest to survive in the slums. One day, he awakens to the memories of Haruto Amakawa, who died in an accident while dreaming of being reunited with his childhood friend, and Rio realizing he has reincarnated in a world of swords and sorcery. Not only that, but after helping stop an attempt to kidnap a princess that he stumbled upon, he finds himself enrolled in a famous school where the children of the nobility gather… As Rio attempts to rise up from the bottom of a hierarchical society, he will have new encounters and say many goodbyes, as he fights to overcome fate.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: ตำนานวิญญาณแฟนซี

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Class Struggle
tags.description: Contains conflict born between the different social classes. Generally between an dominant elite and a suffering oppressed group.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Slavery
tags.description: Prominently features slaves, slavery, or slave trade.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

__Height:__ 158 cm

[Profile (Aoni)](https://www.aoni.co.jp/search/kohno-marika.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/marika_0222) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/marika_kohno/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marika_Kouno) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/高野麻里佳)

She is part of the seiyuu idol group [**Earphones**](https://anilist.co/staff/195973/) (イヤホンズ) with fellow voice actresses [Rie Takahashi](https://anilist.co/staff/119331) and [Yuki Nagaku](https://anilist.co/staff/119370), originally formed for the anime [Sore ga Seiyuu!](https://anilist.co/anime/21009).

**Non-anime roles:**
• Primavera - Memento Mori (VG)

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/gilbertodesyllos/)

Gilberto de Syllos is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, musician, dubbing director and musical director. He is the owner and founder of the dubbing studio Atma Entretenimento and father of the voice actor [Renan Alonso](https://anilist.co/staff/125007/).
